i1.name: Blade's End
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Talon's''' [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''Wound'' [[stack]] to enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks and damaging abilities refresh the duration.

'''Talon's''' next {{tip|basic attack}} against a target with 3 ''Wound'' stacks will consume the stacks to cause them to bleed, dealing them{{ft|{{as|{{pp|75 to 245}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''total''' physical damage}} over 2 seconds,|{{as|{{pp|75/16 to 245/16|round=false}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|physical damage}} every {{fd|0.125}} seconds over 2 seconds,}}increased to 120% damage against {{tip|monsters}}. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Talon's champion ability apply a Wound stack to enemy champions and large monsters hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks and damaging abilities refresh the duration.
Talon's next basic attack against a target with 3 Wound stacks will consume the stacks to cause them to bleed, dealing themincreased to 120% damage against monsters. The target cannot gain stacks during this time.
i1.notes:
* ''Blade End's'' enhanced attack will still trigger if {{tip|blocked}}.
* Both passes of {{ai|Rake|Talon}} and {{ai|Shadow Assault|Talon}} apply a stack of ''Wound''.
* {{Pending for test}}: Interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents ''Wound'' [[stacks]] from being applied.
** {{tip|Spell shield}} prevents ''Blade End's'' enhanced attack from triggering though still consuming all ''Wound'' [[stacks]].

q1.name: Noxian Diplomacy
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the target enemy, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} upon arrival. If ''Noxian Diplomacy'' is cast within close range, '''Talon''' instead stabs the target, {{tip|critical strike|critically striking}} them for {{as|{{critical damage|50|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}, as well as gaining {{sti|75 '''bonus''' attack range}} on his next basic attack within 1 second.
If ''Noxian Diplomacy'' kills its target, '''Talon''' {{tip|heals}} for {{pp|10 to 70}} and 50% of the ability's {{sti|cooldown}} is refunded.
''Noxian Diplomacy's'' stab {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Talon's''' basic attack timer.
''Noxian Diplomacy will cause '''Talon''' to automatically basic attack the target afterwards.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon dashes towards the target enemy, dealing them physical damage upon arrival. If Noxian Diplomacy is cast within close range, Talon instead stabs the target, critically striking them for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage, as well as gaining 75 bonus attack range on his next basic attack within 1 second.
If Noxian Diplomacy kills its target, Talon heals for 10undefined − 70undefined (based on level) and 50% of the ability's cooldown is refunded.
Noxian Diplomacy's stab resets Talon's basic attack timer.
Noxian Diplomacy will cause Talon to automatically basic attack the target afterwards.
q1.notes:
* '''Talon''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash to the target's previous location while still dealing damage if the target is too far away or moves beyond the maximum tracking distance.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, ''Noxian Diplomacy'' can only be cast within stab range.
* ''Noxian Diplomacy'' will also grant the heal if the target dies upon '''Talon's''' completion of the dash.
* ''Noxian Diplomacy'' will still deal damage if the target is {{tip|untargetable}} by the end of the dash.
* If the cast of the stab version is interrupted by the target going untargetable, going too far away from '''Talon''', going out of '''Talon''''s sight or dying, ''Noxian Diplomacy'' will cancel but still go on {{sti|cooldown}} due to a bug.

w1.name: Rake
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' sends out a volley of daggers in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within their path.

Upon traveling maximum range, the daggers then linger for {{fd|0.75}} seconds before flying back to '''Talon''', dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies along the way and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 1 second.
''The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon sends out a volley of daggers in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within their path.
Upon traveling maximum range, the daggers then linger for 0.75 seconds before flying back to Talon, dealing physical damage to all enemies along the way and slowing them for 1 second.
The traveling and returning pass each cannot affect the same enemy more than once.
leveling:
{{st|Return Physical Damage|{{ap|45 to 145}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|45+45to 105+145}} {{as|(+ 125% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|40 to 60}}%}}
w1.notes:
* If '''Talon''' dies while ''Rake'' is mid-air, the projectiles will still complete their travel.
* ''Rake'' will cast from wherever '''Talon''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Return Physical Damage: (+ 70% bonus AD)
  • Total Physical Damage: (+ 125% bonus AD)

  • Slow: %

e1.name: Assassin's Path
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' {{tip|dashes}} over the target [[structures|structure]] or piece of [[terrain]], traveling up to 800 units.
'''Talon''' cannot cast ''Assassin's Path'' on the same structure or area of terrain for a set duration.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon dashes over the target structures or piece of terrain, traveling up to 800 units.
Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same structure or area of terrain for a set duration.
e1.notes:
* ''Assassin's Path'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* '''Talon''' will stop dashing upon entering {{tip|stasis}} but will continue to do so afterwards.
e1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '2' as '2' and riot's value '0,0,0,0,0' as '0'

r1.name: Shadow Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Talon''' disperses a ring of blades around him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies and gaining {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for up to {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
''Shadow Assault'' can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if '''Talon''' emerges from invisibility.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Talon''' ends ''Shadow Assault'', breaking invisibility and converging the blades to his location, dealing the same {{as|physical damage}} to enemies they pass through. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or {{ai|Noxian Diplomacy|Talon}} causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades around him, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and gaining invisibility and bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
Shadow Assault can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration or if Talon emerges from invisibility.
Recast: Talon ends Shadow Assault, breaking invisibility and converging the blades to his location, dealing the same physical damage to enemies they pass through. Breaking invisibility with a basic attack or Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to the target instead.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|90 to 180}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Physical Damage|{{ap|90*2 to 180*2}} {{as|(+ 200% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|40 to 70}}%}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single pass.
* ''Shadow Assault'' does not cancel '''Talon's''' basic attacks.
* ''Shadow Assault'' has a minimum lifetime of 0.8 seconds before convergence.
r1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|100 to 60}}|Starts post-effect}}' as '0/60/20/0' and riot's value '100,80,60' as '100/80/60'
